title: (Tues Early Bird) Show and Tell with the Bobby Bones Show! + Is Amy Responsible for Her Friend’s Stolen Truck?
itunes:title: (Tues Early Bird) Show and Tell with the Bobby Bones Show! + Is Amy Responsible for Her Friend’s Stolen Truck?
description:
It’s Show and Tell Day on The Bobby Bones Show! Everyone brings in an item from home to share with the cast and gives the story behind it. Amy shares a crazy story about how her friend’s truck was stolen after she borrowed it. She asks if we think she’s to blame for it being stolen??

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
